body.name: BRODARK Professional Chef Knife Set, 4 Pcs German Stainless Steel Sharp Kitchen Knives with Kitchen Shears, Ergonomic Handle Cutting Knife Set with Gift Box, Gifts for Women and Men
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 57 mins
features: A Valued Gift: More than just fine knives, this chef knives set is your culinary companion. Ideal for elevating special occasions like Mother's Day, Father's Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas, birthdays, weddings, and housewarming, making it a thoughtful gift for family and friends.

Sharp and Durable: This chef knives set is expertly forged from high-carbon German stainless steel. 14° V-shaped blade ensures precision and 58HRC rating offers excellent edge retention. With BRODARK's perfect technology, cutting and slicing in the kitchen is effortless.

Ergonomic No-Slip Handle: Unlike some other chefs knives, our chefs knife set are designed for comfort and precision in all cutting tasks. Ergonomic wood handles reduce fatigue, offer a secure and non-slip grip to ensure safety when wet. Full-Tang design for balance and stability, no more loose handles.

Compact and Versatile: The sharp kitchen knives set comes with a luxurious gift packaging. It covers all your cooking needs with an 8-inch chef's knives, 8-inch bread knife, 5-inch utility knife and a kitchen shears. Ideal for small kitchens, and minimalists, or as a versatile choice for BBQs, parties, and camping trips.

Lifetime Guarantee: Our professional kitchen knife set is backed by a lifetime guarantee and holds EU patents and certifications including ISO9001, BSCI, and FSC. BRODARK offers a lifetime refund policy and free replacements to ensure your satisfaction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These knives are great! They’re really sharp and they cut very nicely. I use them for everything!! The first thing that I cut with them was a pork shoulder and it went through the meat smoothly. It even went through some of the bone too! The scissors are very sharp as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty decent knives, certainly seen worse.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. For the price these are very good. Nice curve at the bolster for control, good blade shape, nice heft and fair balance.There are some minor issues: - The larger and smallest blades both have ever-so-slight bends to the blade, you can really tell unless you look straight down the blade. The bend is right at the bolster. However, I've seen this a lot in many blades, some more expensive than this. And it's not so bad that affects the performance in any way that I noticed. It was just dumb luck that I even checked and saw it, I usually don't. - The spots where the handles meet the bolster/pommel have some minute imperfections. Visibly they're almost impossible to see, but when you run your hands over them they can snag ever so slightly on the skin. I trimmed them down with a nail file and they're better. Didn't even mar the wood or metal. - It's hard to tell if these are full tang. The tang (part of the blade that goes down the handle) is not visible once it hits the handle, and there are no rivets. I had a knife like this where the metal pommel (the metal piece at the base of the handle, opposite the blade) popped out after a few months. I'm concerned that might happen with these. BUT it hasn't yet, so it's hard to judge against, I wouldn't take points off for that alone. The lack of rivets and visible tang, however...So, despite these cons, these are very nice knives, and the scissors work pretty well too, did some testing with them and so far they seem pretty handy. As you can see in my video the large one came needing a little sharpening, the little one came pretty well. The bread knife, well, it cut a loaf of bread just fine. Overall they look *very* nice and I will eventually probably gift them to someone just moving into a new place and needing knives, but isn't too picky. Like, I wouldn't give these to a picky knife person or a professional chef. But for average, everyday cook, these would make a good gift. For the price point they're a solid 4/5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice knife set!
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice set it would make an excellent gift for a wedding or birthday etc The quality is top-notch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little set and a great gift
reviews.reviewText: A very nice set! I use this as a supplementary set in my outdoor kitchen and it works great. I only need a small assortment of knives for grilling accompaniment so this size set fits the bill. The chefs knife is sharp and sturdy, the shears are heavy duty and easy to clean. Be careful to hand wash these and keep them dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We ordered this knife set a gift for grandma. She loves them. They are very sharp and they come in a handsome box. I recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, beautiful, and very nicely packaged
reviews.reviewText: These knives seem decently sharp and come very nicely packaged, I'm not a fan of the design for the shears as I prefer mine to easily come apart for washing, and the serration on these is very strange to me.I personally prefer a bit more heft to my knives, but I can see a lot of value in a lighter set and am excited to pass these along.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised by how sharp this knife set was! Feels high quality! Would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great knife set. Everything is supper sharp and high quality. I also really love the wood grain handles. Beautiful set.
